name: Laptop
description: That's an expensive laptop! You better know it's gonna be great. With this laptop, you can truly do it all. Oh, by the way Connor, the description field uses HTML formatting, so be sure to escape html characters...

name: Chair
description: Quite the chair, huh? I don't want to say that this is the BEST chair ever, but I mean it is pretty much the best...

name: T-shirt
description: T-shirt for cool people, so if you are as cool as the model displaying this T-shirt, then this is perfect for you.

name: Coffee Maker
description: What a great way to start your new caffine addiction.

name: Drill
description: WARNING: This is not real. This is only a drill. This is merely a training exercise.

name: Shampoo
description:
Shampoo, for those who need.
16 in 1, with uses including drain unclogger and a motor oil alternative.

name: Soccer Ball
description: This one's for you sports fans.

name: Tent
description: This tent included built in bear attractant. Yes you read that correctly, you will soon be cuddling your new 800lb best friend after a night in this tent.

name: Wooden Desk
description: This is a good desk. Who's a good desk? You are.

name: Standing Desk
description: This standing desk sure can make you stand. But it can also tempt you to sit on it while sitting at another one. This has true MegaDesk™ potential.

name: Desktop Computer
description: This is no ordinary beefy computer. It's so beefy it needs a beefy user to operate. It asks YOU to calculate things while it watches YouTube all day.

name: Staples
description: STAPLES! STAPLES! STAPLES! This box of staples is packed with more staples than you can possibly staple! Staple everything in sight with these staple-perfect staples—staple papers, staple documents, staple your other staples to even more staples. Staple your staple to the staple, then grab another staple and staple it again. Staples on staples on staples!

name: Deluxe Cheeseburger
description: You wouldn't order a cheeseburger for delivery, would you? Well, now you can! This one is even deluxe. Truly amazing, the world we live in.
